Sounds like a life of ease to me no work just loafing around all day as you please. Well when I was young things were a mite different, mind you we didn't prance around in strange hippie clothes. What are the youths coming to these days my own son hasn't called in...

Name: Maya
Text: Umm... Nick? Will I grow up to be like her? Please say "no."

Name: Phoenix
Text: I dunno! It's possible.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Hey! Listen when you're being spoken to! Youths today!

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, what do you do here at the studios?

Name: Oldbag
Text: At Global Studios, we make children's dreams come true! In fact, in my younger days...

Name: Maya
Text: No! You were a star!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Only a little twinkle between the stars here, I'm afraid, dearie.

Name: Maya
Text: Wo... wow.

Name: Oldbag
Text: This place has really gone downhill, you know? But 10 years ago, now that was a studio of dreams! Hammer was a big star back then too, he was...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hammer...?

Name: Oldbag
Text: The victim, dummy! The Evil Magistrate! He's been reduced to playing villains now. Not exactly the best material to work with...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Can you tell me about Mr. Will Powers?

Name: Oldbag
Text: He's not a bad kid, but don't be fooled by his mask! You wouldn't want him on the silver screen without it, believe me. Little old ladies watching would lose their lunch! That's probably why he thought that the Steel Samurai was his "big chance." No one thought he was capable of doing what he did to poor Jack Hammer...

Name: Maya
Text: We don't know for certain that Will Powers is guilty!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Powers? Of course he's guilty! How do I know? I know everything! That's my job.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What kind of person was Jack Hammer?

Name: Oldbag
Text: What "kind of person"? Oh... if you only knew! Jack Hammer will live on in many hearts as the ultimate action hero! He was simply dashing in the Dynamite Samurai series!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Should I have heard of that...?)

Name: Oldbag
Text: But... there was an accident during filming five years ago. He got an unlucky break after that. Reduced to playing the villain on a children's program! What's more, I heard they were paying him peanuts. It's enough to make you cry.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Why are you so certain Mr. Powers is the killer?

Name: Oldbag
Text: I was standing right here yesterday, I was. I was here from 1:00 in the afternoon, to 5:00, when they found the body! Now the studio where the murder took place is to the left here. So if you want to go to the studio, you have to pass by me! Only one person went by here between 1:00 and 2:30, when the murder took place!

Name: Phoenix
Text: And... that person was Mr. Powers?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Yes. I saw him!

Name: Phoenix
Text: But Mr. Powers says he was sleeping in his dressing room.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, I'm sure he would say that. He's no fool! But he was the only one that walked by. He's the killer, you can bet your biscuits on it.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Isn't it about time for you to be heading home? There's nothing to see here. Move along.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Um, actually, we're here at Mr. Powers's request.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Hmph! I thought you were suspicious lookin'! Show me a "letter of request." And maybe I'll just let you in.

Name: Maya
Text: This lady here thinks she owns this place, obviously.

Name: Will
Text: Hello! How was the studio? They all think I did it, don't they?

Name: Maya
Text: N-no, not at all! Isn't that right, Nick?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right, not at all. At worst, you're a suspect.

Name: Will
Text: *sniff*

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... about the security guard at the main gate to the studio...

Name: Will
Text: Oh, the security lady?

Name: Maya
Text: She's terrible! She called me "suspicious lookin'"!

Name: Will
Text: Y-yes... actually, she's said the same thing to me before. "Take off that mask!" were her words, I believe. She sucks up to all the bigwigs at the studio... But let her see you stumble once and she'll never let up on you.

Name: Maya
Text: Grr! She's got some nerve!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Do you think you could write up a letter formally requesting my representation?

Name: Will
Text: Of c-course.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I just hope this will get me past that security lady.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ma'am, have a look at this. It's a letter of request from Mr. Powers.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Hmm...? Yes, yes. I recognize the bold, childish scrawl.

Name: Oldbag
Text: To think he would entrust his fate to youths of such unreliable appearance... Really!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Really?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Anyway, you may pass. But only left from here, toward the studios! No going to the right. That's the Employee Area. "No one allowed inside, pal" were my instructions. The good detective told me himself.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, hey, Nick.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Maya
Text: There were maps in the security guard station.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey! Not bad!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Those are 50 cents a piece, thank you!

Name: Maya
Text: Well, time to go, Nick.

Name: Oldbag
Text: 50 cents!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hey! Aren't you that murderer from the other day!

Name: Maya
Text: Aah! It's that confused detective!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hey pal, you know Prosecutor Edgeworth is all upset, and it's your fault! I saw him sipping tea and staring gloomily out the window!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... so?

Name: Maya
Text: Hey! If he's depressed, it's all your fault for doing sloppy detective work!

Name: Maya
Text: Um, Detective?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I think you hurt his feelings.

Name: Maya
Text: Oh no! I... I'm sorry!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, I think his feelings are easily hurt.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: You're right, pal. It's all my fault. I can blame other people all I want, but I know the truth in my heart!

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, hey! Don't take it so hard! There's always the next case!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yeah, I suppose you're right. Hey! What exactly are you two doing here?

Name: Maya
Text: Um, well... We're on this case too, pal!

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Huh!? Hey! You can't just go saying "pal" like that! That's MY endearing character trait!

Name: Maya
Text: I'd say he's a character alright...

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, how is your investigation going, Detective?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Well, it's... Hey! I can't tell you that, pal.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick... Maybe you need to be a little more indirect with your questions?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right. So, Detective, mind if I take a look at what you got?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: What I got?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The autopsy report! The latest version, if you please...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Hmm... right, right. Sorry about what happened last time, pal.

Name: Phoenix
Text: About the security lady...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Oh, that sweet old lady. What a charmer!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? A-are we talking about the same person?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: When I showed her my badge she gave me a donut and some coffee!

Name: Maya
Text: Remember what Powers said. She's a sucker for authority.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: She even gave me a piece of valuable evidence!

Name: Maya
Text: Whaat!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: What kind of evidence!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Well, that, er, photo. The photo of the Steel Samurai heading toward the scene of the crime!

Name: Maya
Text: What! Who took that!?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: See the camera up on that gate, pal?

Name: Maya
Text: The gate? You mean the one with the welcome sign?

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Yeah. Whenever someone walks by, that camera automatically snaps a photo of them!

Name: Maya
Text: Oh no! Nick, he has evidence! We're finished!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Funny, for someone with hard proof he doesn't look too happy.)

Name: Gumshoe
Text: What's wrong, pal? You seem down.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Don't look so happy when you say that.

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Oh hoh hoh hoh hoh!

Name: Maya
Text: Umm... We'd like to ask the employees here some questions...

Name: Gumshoe
Text: Sure thing, pal. Go wherever you like. Of course, you're not going to find any clues I haven't already found! Hah hah hah!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I'm glad someone around here seems to be enjoying themselves.)

Name: Maya
Text: Nick, let's go! We've got a free pass to the place. Now's our chance to check things out!

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! Look! That security lady is in the guard station stuffing her face with donuts! I guess all cops like their donuts!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, and they're soft enough she doesn't need teeth to chew them...

Name: Oldbag
Text: Hey, you! Well? Are you satisfied Powers is guilty yet?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Urk! She had to make my life harder by giving that photo to Detective Gumshoe...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Why didn't you tell us about the security photo, ma'am?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Hmm? Oh, that? I just thought it would be more thrilling to talk with the detective himself! These things are important, you know. Oh, just to the left from here is the gate with the camera that took that photo. It's my job to check the photos every day, you see.

Name: Phoenix
Text: About the security camera...

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh yes, the camera. It's automatic. It can tell when someone walks through that gate, see? Then it snaps a photo! Apparently, it records the time when it takes a picture too. But I don't bother myself with those details. I just view all the photos on the computer over in the security guard station. I check 'em every day before going home, I do.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! This is where they do all the behind-the-scenes stuff! Hey! Look! There's Powers's dressing room! No one's here this soon after the murder I guess. Let's take a look around!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Powers's dressing room... So this is where he was sleeping? Or at least, this is where he claims he was sleeping.)

Name: Maya
Text: No one actually saw him taking a nap here, did they?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right, and there's a picture of him near the crime scene. (I hope he's telling the truth... for his sake!)

Name: Maya
Text: Hmm? This must be Powers's bag.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey, don't open that.

Name: Maya
Text: Look!

Name: Phoenix
Text: An employee cardkey. That must be Powers's. It says "Studio One."

Name: Maya
Text: Let's take it, Nick!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Borrow it. You mean borrow.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The entrance to Studio One. This is the studio where they found Jack Hammer's body.

Name: Maya
Text: Let's go in and check it out, Nick!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I wonder if this cardkey we borrowed from the dressing room will work...
*beep*

Name: Phoenix
Text: It opened!

Name: Maya
Text: Alright! We're in!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (She's way too happy for someone visiting a crime scene.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: What is it?

Name: Phoenix
Text: You're real quiet all of a sudden.

Name: Maya
Text: Doesn't it give you the shivers, Nick? That white tape! It's so... so real!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, the Evil Magistrate did die here. And the Steel Samurai killed him. The murder weapon was the Samurai Spear. Sounds pretty real to me...

Name: Maya
Text: Look, a ladder!

Name: Phoenix
Text: That's a "step"-ladder.

Name: Maya
Text: So? What's the difference? You need to stop judging things based on narrow-minded cultural assumptions, Nick!

Name: Phoenix
Text: R-right... sorry. (This girl is OUT there!)

Name: Maya
Text: Wow, look at that camera! That must cost a ton!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah! So don't touch it!

Name: Maya
Text: Whoa! It's heavier than I thought...

Name: Penny
Text: Hey! You! No touching that!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ah, um, sorry, my partner is kind of, y'know...

Name: Maya
Text: "Y'know"!? No I don't know!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... who are you?

Name: Penny
Text: Who me? I'm an assistant here. I help with props and stuff. Moving them around, ordering new ones, et cetera.

Name: Maya
Text: We're lawyers representing Mr. Will Powers.

Name: Penny
Text: Oh, you're WP's people.

Name: Maya
Text: "WP"...? Oh, Will Powers. W.P., I get it.

Name: Penny
Text: I don't envy you guys one bit! But... do what you can for WP, okay? He'd never hurt a fly! He has to be innocent.

Name: Maya
Text: Don't worry, leave it to us!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Could you tell me anything about the day of the murder?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes. I was in the studio the whole day. I was the only assistant on staff that day, you see.

Name: Maya
Text: Only one assistant!?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes, well, the studios aren't doing so well right now. And yesterday was only rehearsal for our action sequences.

Name: Maya
Text: I see. Neat!

Name: Penny
Text: In the morning we went through the action sequences in the employee area. WP and Hammer were there, along with everyone else.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The employee area--that's where Powers's dressing room is, right?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes, that's the place. After eating lunch there, Mr. Hammer went to Studio One. Then I saw WP go into his dressing room. But I didn't see either of them after that.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Did you know that Mr. Powers was sleeping in his room?

Name: Penny
Text: No! I wouldn't go in there unless I had some urgent message for him... I mean, it's his private... What kind of a girl do you think I am!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: W-what kind...? No, no, I'm sure you're a fine girl. Um, sorry. (So much for getting a confirmation of Powers's alibi.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: So you sensed that someone other than the regular film crew was in the studio?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes... I think.

Name: Phoenix
Text: ("I think" doesn't cut it in a witness testimony.)

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! What about that security lady! If someone else came into the studio, she must have seen them!

Name: Maya
Text: What do we do, Nick? We haven't found anything. If WP was the only one who came to the studio... Then he has to be the killer! They even have a photograph...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hmm...

Name: Penny
Text: Umm... Sorry... I know you're busy.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Not really.

Name: Penny
Text: Actually, there's been something bothering me.

Name: Maya
Text: Ah hah! That's what I'm talking about! A clue! A lead!

Name: Penny
Text: Well, I don't know about that, but that day, just after noon, I sensed someone was here...

Name: Phoenix
Text: You "sensed"?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes, several times.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Some other studio employees, maybe?

Name: Penny
Text: No, I don't think so. The only thing we had scheduled was an action scene run-through. I was the only assistant here that day. I have a feeling it was someone from... outside.

Name: Phoenix
Text: R-really!?

Name: Maya
Text: But wait, if someone had come in here... Wouldn't that security lady have noticed them?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, you're right.

Name: Penny
Text: I'm sorry I don't have any better information than that.

Name: Maya
Text: No, thanks! That helps us a lot. Anything helps. Let's go put that security lady on the spot!

Name: Oldbag
Text: What? You're still here? Really! You look as though you've seen a ghost!

Name: Oldbag
Text: What? I saw that suspicious look on your face!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I wanted to ask you again about yesterday... You came here at 1:00 PM, correct? And the estimated time of Hammer's death was 2:30. Are you sure that Powers was the only one to go through here between those times?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Sure as can be!

Name: Maya
Text: But we have a witness who thinks there was "someone from outside" here that day.

Name: Oldbag
Text: What!?

Name: Maya
Text: Are you absolutely sure you were here watching the whole time?

Name: Maya
Text: Ma'am?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Who was it? Who told you that? Who dares question ME!?

Name: Maya
Text: Eek!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Alright you better tell me and tell me quick, you spiky-haired cretin! Someone's been complaining about the work I do, eh!?

Name: Maya
Text: Uh... um, we were just talking to the assistant in Studio One.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Her! She's not even a full-time employee! All you young'uns are like that nowadays, running your mouths like there was no tomorrow saying this that and the other thing. Well when I was young let me tell you we knew a thing or two about respecting our elders. Back then we did and it's a crying shame that you youths today just say what you please about poor old ladies Graaaaaaaaaaaawr!

Name: Phoenix
Text: She left...

Name: Maya
Text: Well, Nick? This is our chance to do what we can without her looking over our shoulders!

Name: Phoenix
Text: The computer that runs the studio security cameras.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! Maybe we can see that photo of Powers with this computer!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, maybe. (Should I try the computer?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Okay. Let's give it a try.

Name: Maya
Text: You know how to work these things, Nick?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Looks like I just have to enter in a few numbers. Let's see... first, I need the date of the murder. (It looks like the camera turned on at 1:00 PM that day... 1:00... That was when the security lady arrived at the guard station.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: There! Entered! ...

Name: Maya
Text: Hey! It printed out the data for that day!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Let's see what we got... ... Huh?

Name: Maya
Text: How is this a picture of Will Powers?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, he is the one who always wears that suit... I guess that's why the security lady thought it was him.

Name: Maya
Text: I don't imagine the detective was very happy with this photo as evidence. Hmm? Something's printed on the back.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh? [Oct 15, 2:00 PM, Photo #2]

Name: Maya
Text: What does that mean?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Maybe there's more photo data from that day?

Name: Maya
Text: Nope--that's the only one in the computer.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, hey, Nick! Can't we use this photo as evidence for the trial?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah.

Name: Maya
Text: We'll put that security lady in her place with this!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right, we'll put her in her place...

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, that's what I said! Anyway... Let's show her this photo and see what she says!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wait. Let's not.

Name: Maya
Text: Why not?

Name: Phoenix
Text: It's never a good idea to reveal your hand to the enemy too soon.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! You're craftier than I gave you credit for. Why, you could be the next... Evil Magistrate!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey! Why do I have to be the villain.

Name: Maya
Text: Relax, it was just a joke! So, are we done for today?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I think this photo is what we needed for the trial. Still, it'd be better if we had some idea who the real killer was! Maybe it really is that security lady...?

Name: Judge
Text: The court is now in session for the trial of Mr. Will Powers.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: The prosecution is ready, Your Honor.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The defense is ready, Your Honor.

Name: Judge
Text: Very well. Mr. Edgeworth, your opening statement, please.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: The prosecution will show the court that at 2:30 PM on October 15, the defendant, Mr. Will Powers, killed fellow actor Jack Hammer at Studio One of Global Studios. It is impossible for anyone else to have committed this heinous crime. The evidence presented during the trial will all point to this fact.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm. I see. Very well, I would like to move on to your testimony. Mr. Edgeworth, the prosecution may call its first witness.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: First, I would like to call a familiar face, Detective Gumshoe, to the stand.

Name: Judge
Text: So the murder weapon was a "spear"? How... medieval!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Your Honor. This case is quite simple if you ask one question: And that question is: "What did the security lady at the guard station see?"

Name: Judge
Text: Understood.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Let's call this security officer to the stand!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Will the witness declare her name?

Name: Oldbag
Text: ... Hmm? My, aren't you a handsome fellow! I'm afraid I'm a bit flustered!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Y-your name, please!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, dearie! No need for you to be embarrassed! Just call me "grandma."

Name: Edgeworth
Text: YOUR NAME, PLEASE!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Seems Edgeworth has a bit of trouble getting his witnesses to say their names...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Wendy Oldbag, dearie. So just call me "grandma." It's practically my name! So even when I was young I was an Oldbag, but not really that was just my name dearie. Still how the other children would make fun of me and just because of my name can you believe it? But there was this boy, the captain of the chess club in junior high, and when he called me an old bag well I just cried and cried because I had a crush on him you see--

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Edgeworth
Text: O-objection! I... object to the witness's talkativeness.

Name: Judge
Text: Objection sustained! The witness will refrain from rambling on the stand.

Name: Oldbag
Text: I was just getting to the good part, dearie!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Perhaps we can get to the testimony?

Name: Judge
Text: Now, the witness was stationed at the main gate on the day of the murder, correct?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Yessey I was.

Name: Judge
Text: And to get to the scene of the murder, someone would have to pass by you?

Name: Oldbag
Text: You know your stuff, dearie!

Name: Judge
Text: ... You may begin your testimony.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (She sure is one hell of an Oldbag...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: On the day of the murder, I arrived at the guard station at 1:00 PM.

Name: Phoenix
Text: So up until that time, anyone who wanted to could go into the studio?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well, there wasn't a security guard at the gate, no. But the main gate was locked, dearie. You'd need an employee cardkey to get in.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Right... the cardkey that I have. So, what she's saying is no one who wasn't supposed to be there could get in.)

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Was there anyone at the studios when you arrived at the guard station?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Poor old Hammer and the rest had been doing a run-through there since the morning.

Name: Phoenix
Text: A "run-through"...?

Name: Oldbag
Text: They were working out a scene between the Steel Samurai and the Evil Magistrate. They got the basics figured out by noon, and were to use the afternoon for practice. Rehearsal was supposed to start at 5:00. That's why poor old Hammer went to Studio One in the afternoon.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (So Powers was in his dressing room sleeping... when he was supposed to be practicing! Talk about a laid-back hero...)

Name: Edgeworth
Text: If there was a run-through in the morning, why did you only get there after noon?

Name: Oldbag
Text: I, well, I had some errands to run that morning.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What kind of "errands"?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, well, you know.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Answer the question!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Actually... I was watching poor Hammer and Powers. Observing, you know?

Name: Phoenix
Text: O-observing? Weren't you supposed to be at the guard station?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Whippersnapper! I told you I locked the gate, didn't I? I did my job!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I'm not sure your boss would see it that way...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Anyway! I always watch Hammer's run-throughts. Always! Never missed one in all my years.

Name: Maya
Text: Wow! I want to see a Steel Samurai run-through too!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You could quit being a spirit medium and take up guard duty.

Name: Maya
Text: Not a bad idea...

Name: Oldbag
Text: Anyway, it was 1:00 when I got to the guard station.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Did you see the victim then?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Did I see poor old Hammer? Nope. He'd already gone to the studio before I got back to the guard station.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Tell us what happened next.

Name: Oldbag
Text: I was at the main gate from then until 5:00!

Name: Phoenix
Text: So you were watching there the WHOLE time? No breaks? Not even a second?

Name: Oldbag
Text: O-of course! I am a professional, you know! Our are you criticizing how I do my job!? Whippersnapper!

Name: Phoenix
Text: No, it's just, after seeing you eating those donuts in the guard station yesterday...

Name: Oldbag
Text: I can watch the gate and eat donuts at the same time! Snipperwhapper!

Name: Maya
Text: "Snipperwhapper"...? Old windbag is losing it, Nick.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Why don't you raise an objection?

Name: Judge
Text: So, the witness was on duty through the afternoon, the whole time. Very well. What did you see?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Now, the murder happened at 2:30 PM, right?

Name: Phoenix
Text: How did you know that?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh hoh hoh. I have my ways! That over-dressed young detective told me. I fed him some donuts and he talked and talked... If you ask me, that detective isn't cut out for his job.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Poor Detective Gumshoe, getting chewed out by a security guard...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Interesting to me, because a certain man walked right by me at 2:00 PM.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: 2:00? You're sure?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Sure as spit!

Name: Judge
Text: Well, who was the man!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Really, you should try not to get so excited at your age. You might strain something.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Now, now, don't get your skivvies all in a bunch. I'll tell you who it was!

Name: Oldbag
Text: It was Powers! That man right there, and he was heading toward the studio!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: So you saw Mr. Powers?

Name: Oldbag
Text: That's what I said! Got wax in your ears, sonny?

Name: Maya
Text: Nick, this is your chance!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, time to pull out the secret weapon...

Name: Oldbag
Text: I'll say it again! It was him!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Let me get this straight, old bag! Er, Ms. Oldbag! You've been saying since yesterday that you "saw Mr. Powers," correct? But you're talking about the man in this photo, aren't you!

Name: Judge
Text: J-just a moment, Mr. Wright. Let me see that photo! ... What is this, exactly?

Name: Phoenix
Text: None other than the Steel Samurai, defender of Neo Olde Tokyo. Ms. Oldbag! Is this the "Mr. Powers" that you saw!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Of course! Didn't your momma teach you any sense, sonny? Anyone can plainly see that's Powers! Right?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Um, yeah. ... Umm... well. I wonder?

Name: Phoenix
Text: True, Mr. Powers does play the role of the Steel Samurai! But that doesn't mean Mr. Powers IS the Steel Samurai!

Name: Oldbag
Text: ...! I... I know that! I wasn't born yesterday!

Name: Judge
Text: No one in this court is accusing you of that, Ms... er, witness.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (He's having trouble calling her "Oldbag" apparently...)

Name: Judge
Text: However, you do not have proof that the person in this photo is Mr. Will Powers, do you?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Humph! Nosy old man! Of course I have proof!

Name: Phoenix
Text: What!?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Huh!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Even Edgeworth is surprised!?)

Name: Edgeworth
Text: The prosecution would like to ask the old... the witness. Please make known all the information in your possession ahead of time!

Name: Oldbag
Text: How was I to know everyone would be so nosy! You should be ashamed, all of you! Anyway, I showed that photo to the young detective. He told me "this isn't any good as evidence, pal." He didn't even give it a second look!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Wow, old windbag has left even Edgeworth speechless. She's good!)

Name: Judge
Text: Let's hear about your proof, then.

Name: Oldbag
Text: I never say anything I don't mean, mind you!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm...

Name: Oldbag
Text: Whippersnapper!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Hey, I haven't said anything yet!)

Name: Oldbag
Text: I'll have you know I'm not pointing fingers at anyone behind their backs! Everything I've said is on the straight and narrow! The up and up! Youth today! Always whining about each other, pointing fingers this way and that! It's enough to make an old lady want to cry...

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Mr. Wright! Please, for all our sakes, try not to upset the witness!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I think Edgeworth has met his match...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: That morning, during the run-through of the action scene...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Who was present at the run-through?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well, let's see... There was Powers, he's the Steel Samurai... Then poor old Hammer, the Evil Magistrate. And... me.

Name: Judge
Text: And what exactly were you doing?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Observing! Just... observing.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What about the assistant?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, she was off moving backdrops around and such.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (So she didn't see the run-through, then...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: I saw Powers trip and fall!

Name: Phoenix
Text: "Trip and fall"...?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Yes! And to think, he's supposed to be the Steel Samurai! What a laugh! So Powers sprained his ankle. I helped make it better for him, of course.

Name: Judge
Text: You... helped make it better?

Name: Oldbag
Text: I kissed it where it hurt.

Name: Judge
Text: L-let's just skip over that part, shall we?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Where was the assistant then?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, her? She was cleaning up backdrops, I think. She didn't know about Powers's ankle.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: You may continue your testimony.

Name: Oldbag
Text: He broke one of the props, it was a big mess.

Name: Phoenix
Text: He broke a prop?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Sure did! His own Samurai Spear.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (His Samurai Spear... the murder weapon!?)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Luckily I was there with my duct tape to fix it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (This strikes me as a significant detail... I'd better write this down in the Court Record.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Apparently, he sprained his ankle pretty bad.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Was Mr. Powers' ankle badly sprained?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Not so bad that he couldn't walk around. He went to his dressing room to rest up after lunch.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Thus the nap...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Anyway, I saw him dragging his foot when he walked.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Dragging his foot... okay.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: You can see he's dragging his leg! See? Clear as day!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Are you absolutely sure? (Let's take a look at that picture again... Hmm... so he was walking strangely because he was injured...)

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm. It does look like he was dragging his foot.

Name: Oldbag
Text: See! And you didn't trust me! Whippersnapper!

Name: Oldbag
Text: That's how I knew it was Powers. Happy?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Still, you can't look at this and say it's Mr. Powers!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Yes, but only Mr. Powers would have been dragging his leg!

Name: Judge
Text: He has a point. It does seem quite likely that it was Powers.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (There's got to be more to this. I'd better keep pressing her.)

Name: Edgeworth
Text: I think we've heard enough! Haven't we, Your Honor?

Name: Judge
Text: Well, there is one thing that bothers me.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Which is?

Name: Judge
Text: Where is this "Steel Samurai" costume now?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Umm... hmm. Actually, well... We couldn't find it. We're looking, though.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm...

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Anyway, that's not important! The witness did see the Steel Samurai, yes. And it is clear that the person in the Steel Samurai suit was Mr. Will Powers!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... I suppose that's right.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Are you sure you're sure, Your Honor?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hold it right there! We keep talking possibilities, but we have to agree that this photo shows the Steel Samurai! Nowhere in this photo can we see Mr. Will Powers!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... The defense has a point. I also wonder if someone else not caught on camera could have killed Mr. Hammer. We have to consider that possibility, also.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Then allow me to remove that doubt from your mind, Your Honor...

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Will the witness continue her testimony, please?

Name: Oldbag
Text: No need to ask twice!

Name: Oldbag
Text: The time of poor Hammer's death was 2:30 PM, true?

Name: Phoenix
Text: How do you know that?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Eh? Didn't I just explain? I gave donuts to the young detective. And the, after some rubbish about it being a "secret, pal" he told me everything.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I see Detective Gumshoe shares his fellow officer's fondness for donuts.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: The only person I saw go to the studio before then was Will Powers!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Are you absolutely sure!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, quite, quite, sonny. Nobody suspicious lookin' passed by at all.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Nobody suspicious lookin'... Right.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: No one else went there!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: What about before you got to the guard station?

Name: Oldbag
Text: You mean before 1:00? Why, everyone was in the Employee Area before then. And I locked the main gate so no one could get in. Not to mention...

Name: Oldbag
Text: If they had, I would have seen them!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Are you sure!?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Edgeworth
Text: The witness has answered the question! Anyone going into the studio had to pass by the witness!

Name: Oldbag
Text: That's right, sonny! You let 'em have it, Edgey-boy!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (E-Edgey-boy...?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hold on! Look at this photograph one more time. This photo was taken by the camera at the gate for the studios, correct?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Yesiree, sonny.

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, whenever anyone passes by here, it automatically takes a picture?

Name: Oldbag
Text: And here I thought you didn't know your head from a hole in the ground.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right... Anyway! It's also true that the computer in the guard station records all security cam data.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Ooh! You know, if you wanted to work at the studio, we might have an opening.

Name: Phoenix
Text: That very computer printed out this photo. Note that on the back of the photo are printed the words: [Oct 15, 2:00 PM, Photo #2]

Name: Oldbag
Text: Even I know that means it was taken at 2:00 PM on October the 15th! Really, sonny!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Actually, I knew that too. The issure here is the bit at the end where it says: "Photo #2"...

Name: Phoenix
Text: The computer only held data for one photo on that day. Don't you think that's odd? Shouldn't this photo be "Photo #1" if it really was the ONLY photo!?

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! Please tell the court what you mean by this, Mr. Wright!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Actually, that's what I want to ask the witness. This evidence shows that not one, but two people went to the studio that day. Yet there is only data for one of the photos! Who could have erased the data for the other photo? Only someone with access... the security lady herself!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Eh!? You watch your mouth, whippersnapper! The only person I saw that day was Will Powers!

Name: Phoenix
Text: But the camera on the gate fired twice! That means two people went by!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Umm... well, yes... that's what it would seem to mean...

Name: Judge
Text: Can the witness explain this to the court?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Umm... ahem. I-I don't understand these new-fangled computer things... Umm... E-Edgey-boy! Help!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Huh!? B-believe me, I want to, but I don't know what this means either.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Humph! Some help you are! You're a whippersnapper too! ... ... Whippersnapper...?

Name: Judge
Text: Something the matter, Ms. Oldbag?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Ah! That's right! I... I just remembered something!

Name: Judge
Text: Let me guess... Someone else passed by the gate... someone other than the Steel Samurai?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Er... well, yes, I suppose you could put it that way.

Name: Judge
Text: *sigh* I see. Your testimony, please.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Every day, after I finish my guard duties, I have one other important job to do.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Another "job"?

Name: Oldbag
Text: T-that's right. I check all the people that passed by the main gate that day. I look closely at every one of the photos that security camera takes.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Do you backup all of the security camera data?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well, they keep telling me too, yes. But those computers are just so frustrating.

Name: Oldbag
Text: I go through the photos recorded on the security computer and check them.

Name: Phoenix
Text: How many photos are there, usually?

Name: Oldbag
Text: On a day when we're open to the public, we get more than 500 people. But on filming days or rehearsal days... well, we don't have much money. We never get more than 50, and that's a big day.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Do you backup all of the security camera data?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well, they keep telling me too, yes. But those computers are just so frustrating.

Name: Oldbag
Text: I throw out any photos that aren't suspicious lookin', you see.

Name: Phoenix
Text: How exactly do you determine what isn't "suspicious lookin'"?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, you can tell by looking at their faces. For the most part.

Name: Phoenix
Text: F-for the most part? This is a murder trial, Ms. Oldbag!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well, I didn't touch that suspicious lookin' Will Powers's photo, did I?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I think she's missing the point.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Come to think of it, now I remember throwing out one photo that day!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Holdit.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, who in the heck was in that photo you erased!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Humph. A fanboy.

Name: Phoenix
Text: F-fanboy?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Steel Samurai fanboys. Real freaks, if you ask me. They get information about the rehearsals from gosh-knows-where. They're always hanging about. One was there that day.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Objection.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: W-wait a second! Didn't you just say no one else could get in!? "I locked the main gate so no one could get in"... Those were your words!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well! If you must know, there's a drain that goes into the Employee Area. The grate has been loose for a while. It leads outside, and well, that's where they come in.

Name: Phoenix
Text: They come in through the drain?

Name: Oldbag
Text: I told you they were freaks. Oh, and...

Name: Phoenix
Text: And...?

Name: Oldbag
Text: They're kids. Children. Whippersnappers.

Name: Phoenix
Text: K-kids!? So, on the photo that you erased...?

Name: Oldbag
Text: It was a boy. Probably 2nd or 3rd grade.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Whaaaaaaaaaaaat!?

Name: Judge
Text: O-order! Order! Let me get this straight. You saw two people pass by the gate on their way to the studios that day? One was the Steel Samurai, dragging his leg. The other was a boy who looked to be in about 2nd or 3rd grade?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh yes, well we see his type there every day. Can't stop 'em. Can't catch 'em.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: A boy in 2nd or 3rd grade? Hmm... I assume it would be hard, if not impossible for a young boy to wield the Samurai Spear?

Name: Judge
Text: Impossible, I'd think. It's quite heavy.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Right! As I said, I didn't pay him much mind. That's why I erased the data.

Name: Maya
Text: Um, Nick? What's going on? I mean, the boy was there, that makes him a suspect!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, and they're already trying to "un-suspect" him.

Name: Judge
Text: I'd like to take a five minute recess. I want the defense and the prosecution to consider this new information... And no forgetting vital information this time!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Mr. WP?

Name: Will
Text: Y-yes?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Tell me straight: were you really in your dressing room? You didn't go to the studio?

Name: Will
Text: I-I didn't go to the studio! I was s-sleeping, honest.

Name: Maya
Text: So who was the "Steel Samurai" in that security photo?

Name: Will
Text: How should I know? The Steel Samurai costume was off in the corner of the dressing room. Anyone could have walked in and taken it, really.

Name: Maya
Text: What!? You should take better care of that stuff!

Name: Will
Text: I couldn't imagine anyone would want to steal a Steel Samurai costume! So... where does this leave me?

Name: Phoenix
Text: It doesn't look good...

Name: Will
Text: *sniff*

Name: Phoenix
Text: You're the only likely suspect, right now.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! W-what are we going to do!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: First, we play for more time. We'll start targeting someone else that could conceivably have done this!

Name: Maya
Text: Right! And it'll take them so long to shoot us down that we can get another day!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right... but if we pick the wrong person, we might lose on the spot.

Name: Will
Text: You... don't sound very optimistic.

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'm not optimistic at all, actually.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, Nick. It's time.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Okay. Let's go. *sigh*

Name: Will
Text: What does that mean... Please don't sigh like that! *sniff*

Name: Judge
Text: The court will now reconvene for the trial of Mr. Will Powers. Mr. Edgeworth, will you present the prosecution's thoughts on this matter?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: The prosecution's thoughts are simple. Nothing has changed. The other person who went to the studios was a boy of roughly 10 years of age. The photo we do have may not be hard evidence... But there is still no one else that could have committed this crime! I call for a verdict of "guilty" for the defendant, Mr. Will Powers!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Very well. Mr. Wright, your thoughts?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The defense disagrees with the prosecution's claim. There IS another person who could have committed this crime!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Interesting... Let us hear who you have in mind! However... Be aware that this court does not look kindly on accusing the innocent. If you accuse someone who is obviously innocent, you will be penalized.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Right. Great. As if the stakes weren't high enough.)

Name: Judge
Text: So, who was this person other than Mr. Powers that could have committed murder?

Name: Phoenix
Text: It was the security lady! Wendy Oldbag!

Name: Oldbag
Text: W-who!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: The Steel Samurai is dragging his leg in this picture. That means whoever was in the suit knew about that morning's injury. Maybe because... they had been watching the action scene run-through! There was only one person other than Powers and Hammer who knew about the injury. The security lady, Oldbag!

Name: Oldbag
Text: W-what!? Whippersnapper!

Name: Judge
Text: Order! Order! I-is this true, Oldbag!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oldbag!? That's Ms. Oldbag to you!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ms. Oldbag was standing guard alone at the main gate. She was by herself... in other words, she has no alibi! She could have briefly left her post to steal the the Steel Samurai costume... Then slipped into Studio One, the scene of the murder!

Name: Judge
Text: W-why would she go through the trouble of wearing the Steel Samurai costume!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Simple, Your Honor. She knew the camera at the gate would take her picture. If she was in his costume, she could point the finger at Mr. Powers!

Name: Judge
Text: I see! Excellent deductive reasoning, Mr. Wright.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Ohhh yeah, right here! Sherlock Holmes II, baby!) ...? (That's odd. Isn't this the part where Edgeworth pounces...? Doesn't he usually jump up with an objection and some new damning evidence...?)

Name: Judge
Text: Well, Mr. Edgeworth? Does the prosecution have an opinion on this matter?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... The prosecution has no meaningful objections at this time.

Name: Oldbag
Text: W-w-what!? What's that supposed to mean!? Oh, so you all think I did it? Is that it!? Edgey-boy! Don't just sit there, do something!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (What's my move? Maybe now's my chance to take this the whole way?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: The very same reasoning that makes Mr. Powers a suspect in this case... can be used to cast doubt on Ms. Oldbag's actions on that day!

Name: Oldbag
Text: B-but why would I do something so horrible to poor Hammer!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: You forget that Mr. Powers lacks a clear motive, too.

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Indeed.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (That did it. Now windbag is one of the suspects. No hard feelings... I hope.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Wait just a minute! What about the other person who went to the studio!? The boy! The one whose photo I erased!

Name: Judge
Text: He's only a grade schooler though, as you said. 2nd or 3rd grade, was it?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Th-that doesn't matter! When I was that age, I could pin my old man in 10 seconds, tops!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... Your thoughts, Mr. Wright?

Name: Phoenix
Text: That boy is not the killer.

Name: Oldbag
Text: What!? How can you be so sure! Oh, or is it be nice to the kids and mean to your elders day? Whippersnapper!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I have proof.

Name: Oldbag
Text: P-proof!?

Name: Judge
Text: Indeed? Then let's see this proof, Mr. Wright. You have proof that shows the boy could not have committed this murder?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Takethat.gif

Name: Phoenix
Text: The scene of the murder, as we all know, was Studio One. However, you need a cardkey to enter Studio One! How could a boy with no formal relation to the studios have a cardkey!?

Name: Judge
Text: I see! Well, would the witness care to comment on this?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Mrph.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (The windbag... speechless. This has got to be a first.)

Name: Judge
Text: Very well! This court will suspend proceedings on the current trial for today. Mr. Edgeworth, please find out more about your witness, Ms. Windy... what was her name?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Something "Oldbag," Your Honor.

Name: Judge
Text: Then the prosecution will look further into this Oldbag before we continue! That is all. The court is adjourned!

Name: Oldbag
Text: W-wait a second! I'm not going to just sit here while you run off barking up the wrong tree... me! I'm talking!

Name: Maya
Text: Oh, great, stop the presses! The windbag wants to talk!

Name: Judge
Text: Ms. Oldbag! What is this all about? Have you omitted something from your testimony?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Actually, if you must know, there's something I was told not to talk about.

Name: Phoenix
Text: N-not to talk about?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: By whom!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Huh? You mean it wasn't Edgeworth who told her not to talk...?)

Name: Judge
Text: W-well, testify!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Global Studios wanted me to keep quiet about something.

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, you were told not to talk?

Name: Oldbag
Text: That's right! By the studio and TV bigwigs, no less!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Why didn't I hear about this!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Don't be too hard on yourself, sonny. We were all in on it.

Name: Oldbag
Text: There were... some other people at the studios on the day of the murder.

Name: Phoenix
Text: W-who were these people!?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well, the director and the producer, for starters...

Name: Phoenix
Text: The... director?

Name: Edgeworth
Text: We should have known something was fishy! How could they have done a run-through of their action scene without a director? Of course!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Yes, well, I was surprised no one asked about it.

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, where were these people?

Name: Oldbag
Text: The director was in the Employee Area all morning for the run-through. He joined the producer around lunchtime and they had a meeting after that.

Name: Edgeworth
Text: Where!

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh, in the Studio Two trailer.

Name: Phoenix
Text: S-Studio Two...!? (There was a Studio Two...?)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Well, if you look at the guidemap... Here it is. You go through the gate and all the way to the left.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (The path where the monkey's head was fallen over.)

Name: Judge
Text: Well, Mr. Wright... Would you like to continue the cross-examination...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I think I've already asked all my questions, but...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Your Honor. We have learned there were others at Global Studios on the day in question. The director and the producer and, er, some bigwigs, were all present. Yet, as we stand here, they have not been questioned! I hold that it is impossible to declare a verdict on the defendant, Mr. Powers!

Name: Judge
Text: Hmm... The court acknowledges the defense's point. The prosecution will gather more information about the witness, Ms. Oldbag... and more information about these other people we have just been told of!

Name: Edgeworth
Text: ... I understand, Your Honor.

Name: Judge
Text: This ends the day's proceedings in the trial of Mr. Will Powers. That is all. The court is adjourned!

Name: Will
Text: Th-thank you so much, Mr. Wright. I was right to ask you to defend me.

Name: Maya
Text: Aww, really, it's nothing. *grin* Oh, or should I... *sniff*

Name: Phoenix
Text: We'll be going down to the studios to do some more investigation. We have to find out more about this director and producer. They'll be turning up in the next trial as witnesses for certain. So now's my chance to get material for the cross-examination!

Name: Maya
Text: So, Nick... Have we figured out just who it was in that Steel Samurai costume? Could it really have been old windbag?

Name: Phoenix
Text: What do you think, Mr. Powers?

Name: Will
Text: I don't think it was her, really.

Name: Maya
Text: Neither do I, Nick.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yeah, I know! Look, I was just buying time back there. Someone had to be the bad guy for a bit to take the pressure off Mr. Powers.

Name: Maya
Text: Poor old windbag... I feel kinda sorry for her.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Well, she wasn't winning any points in there, with or without my accusation. Okay, let's get down to the studios.

Name: Maya
Text: Right! We'll be back to visit you soon...

Name: Will
Text: Th-thanks. Thanks, guys. *sniff*

Name: Phoenix
Text: Whew, what a day.

Name: Maya
Text: This is no time for relaxing, Nick! Say, you think WP's got a chance?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I guess that really depends on the people we found out about in today's trial.

Name: Maya
Text: The director and producer...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, them.

Name: Maya
Text: Well, what are we doing here then!? Let's get to the studios!

Name: Maya
Text: No one's here.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right, now that they have Ms. Oldbag in custody. I guess they don't have anyone else to replace her...

Name: Maya
Text: H-hey! In the guard station! Look! She left her donuts! ... ... What? I wasn't going to eat them!

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, Nick. It looks like Detective Gumshoe isn't here today.

Name: Phoenix
Text: You're right. He's probably up to his neck in paperwork after the commotion at today's trial.

Name: Maya
Text: So, Nick... Remember that "Studio Two" we heard about at the trial today? It was down that path with the fallen tree, right?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah, I think that's what they said.

Name: Maya
Text: Maybe the director and the rest of them are there today? Now's our chance, Nick! Let's check it out!

Name: Maya
Text: This... is Studio Two?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I thought so...

Name: Maya
Text: It doesn't really look much like a "studio," does it?

Name: Phoenix
Text: No, that it does not.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey... There's a trailer over there.

Name: Phoenix
Text: It looks pretty sturdy for a movie set trailer.

Name: Maya
Text: Are we sure this is a studio?

Name: Maya
Text: Look, it's that assistant girl. Hey!

Name: Penny
Text: Hi... WP's lawyers, right? I heard about the trial! Great job, guys!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Oh? Oh hoh hoh. Don't mention it.

Name: Penny
Text: Is it true they caught the security lady!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Oh! Oh... oh hoh hoh!

Name: Penny
Text: Actually, she just called me. She told me to cover up that drain...

Name: Phoenix
Text: You mean that one? (Wow, what a mess...)

Name: Penny
Text: I... I know... I'm not so good with handiwork. Some assistant, right?

Name: Maya
Text: Yeah, but you do work on the props, and the backdrops, right?

Name: Penny
Text: R-right. Just... lots of times they end up looking worse than they did before I fixed them.

Name: Maya
Text: Oh? Oh! Well, I'm sure these things happen. Nothing to worry yourself about!

Name: Penny
Text: You're right! I won't!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Personally, I think she should worry at least a little bit more...)

Name: Penny
Text: Um, if you'll excuse me, I have to go to the guard station. I'm supposed to fill in for Ms. Oldbag.

Name: Maya
Text: Right! See you later, then!

Name: Penny
Text: Good luck with your investigation.

Name: Maya
Text: This is where the Steel Samurai costume was, on the day of the murder.

Name: Phoenix
Text: That's what Mr. Powers says, at least. I guess they snuck in and took it while he was sleeping.

Name: Maya
Text: But Nick, what if Mr. Powers hadn't been sleeping? I wonder what the killer was planning on doing then?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh... (She's got a point!)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Looks like someone was sleeping here. Maybe Powers did take a nap here, like he said.

Name: Phoenix
Text: There's a bunch of snacks on the table. They must give these to the employees. Some tea and cookies...

Name: Maya
Text: Wait... Nick!

Name: Phoenix
Text: W-what now?

Name: Maya
Text: These snacks... they've passed the expiration date!

Name: Phoenix
Text: ... Then don't eat them.

Name: Maya
Text: *grumble* (They're snacks! They're meant to be eaten!)

Name: Penny
Text: Oh... hello.

Name: Maya
Text: Ho hoh! You look a little out of place.

Name: Penny
Text: It's the clothes, isn't it? I thought my camo vest might do the trick... Kind of an "alternative guard fashion" thing.

Name: Maya
Text: Do kids sneak in here a lot?

Name: Penny
Text: Well... I don't think there's that many of them, but I do see one in particular a bunch. He's always gawking at the sets, or snapping pictures. You should see Old Windbag's eyes flash when she sees him. She has a bit of trouble catching him though...

Name: Phoenix
Text: I heard something at the trial today. They said that the director and producer were here the day of the murder...

Name: Penny
Text: Oh, sorry... I was in the prop storage room, so I didn't see them. I guess they were here, though. The studio head seemed pretty eager to keep us quiet.

Name: Maya
Text: So they were trying to protect the director?

Name: Penny
Text: More the producer, really. The producer's our real star here. She saved these studios from the brink of disaster and kept them running. I don't think we'd still be in business if it weren't for that producer!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (The producer, huh?)

Name: Manella
Text: WTF? Who are j00 d00dz!? LMAO!

Name: Maya
Text: H-huh!? W-we... Wait, you first! Who are you!? You look pretty suspicious to me!

Name: Manella
Text: Whatever, l4m3rs! How can j00 not know the great Sal Manella!? I make teh L33T SH0WZ! The Steel Samurai? Mine! RTFC! (Read The Film Credits!)

Name: Maya
Text: R-really!? You're THE Sal Manella!? I'm so sorry! I, just, you looked so... Sorry!

Name: Manella
Text: No no, quite alright. Really. It's fine. ROFL! ...

Name: Maya
Text: W-what is it?

Name: Manella
Text: You know, on closer inspection... Mmm... Yeah... Hot! Hot! Hot! *slobber* Hey, do j00 do a lot of "cosplay," coz that costume r0x0rz!... *drool*

Name: Maya
Text: Rocksores!? Wh-wh-what... Hey! You're drooling!

Name: Manella
Text: Huh? Mmph! LOL! Buffer overrun! *pant* You've triggered my CR34T1V3 P0W3RZ! Yes... yes, it's coming to me! "Pink Princess"! The sequel to the Steel Samurai... "Pink Princess: Warrior of Little Olde Tokyo!" ROFL... LMAO!

Name: Phoenix
Text: P-"Pink Princess"...?

Name: Maya
Text: Why's it gotta be "Little" Olde Tokyo!? Why can't it have a cool name, like "Neo Olde Tokyo"!?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Maya, we really need to talk about "cool"...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Did you notice anything unusual on the day of the murder?

Name: Manella
Text: Oh, I know who j00 d00dz are. That security lady told j00 about us, eh?

Name: Phoenix
Text: That's right.

Name: Manella
Text: It was a pretty regular day. We had a run-through for an action scene in the morning. Then a meeting from lunchtime in the Studio Two trailer. Heh. I was so busy I didn't even get a chance to eat lunch! :(

Name: Phoenix
Text: A t-bone steak, was it?

Name: Manella
Text: Yeah... sux0rz! I hate missing out on food...

Name: Maya
Text: Nick... what does "Sucksores" mean?

Name: Phoenix
Text: No idea...

Name: Manella
Text: Anyway, I was in a meeting from noon till after 4:00. With the producer, and some bigwigs from the network.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Mr. Hammer's time of death was estimated at 2:30 PM. If he's telling the truth, that meeting gives him an alibi...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: About the producer who was at the meeting with you...

Name: Manella
Text: Oh, you mean Dee Vasquez? She's a genius. M4d sk1llz, all the way. Scary, though. *sweats* She brought these studios back from the brink of destruction. She's the one who made it possible for me to make the Steel Samurai!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You had a meeting with her on the day of the murder, right?

Name: Manella
Text: Yeah, we were together from noon to 4:00 PM, the whole time.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Who exactly are these "bigwigs" people keep mentioning?

Name: Manella
Text: Oh, the boss over at the network, and some sponsors. Also a few production guys. They piled into a limousine and got here right around noon. Major tension! *sweats*

Name: Phoenix
Text: Were all of them with you the entire time?

Name: Manella
Text: Yeah, unfortunately. They're all gray-haired geezers... *scowl*

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Hmm... sounds like they'd all be reliable witnesses.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: (This place is deserted...)
*crash!*

Name: Maya
Text: Eek! N-N-Nick! W-w-what was that noise!? It sounded like it came from inside the trailer...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Someone must be inside...

Name: Maya
Text: H-Hello? ...

Name: Phoenix
Text: No answer.

Name: Maya
Text: Pretty suspicious, if you ask me, Nick! Let's go in!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'm not sure we should be barging in... ...Huh. It's locked.

Name: Maya
Text: What? Don't we have a key?

Name: Phoenix
Text: No. But there's probably one in the guard station at the main gate.

Name: Maya
Text: Then what are we waiting for? Let's borrow it!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (If they'll let us...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Ah hah! You again!

Name: Maya
Text: Eeeek!

Name: Oldbag
Text: How rude, acting like you've seen a ghost!

Name: Phoenix
Text: You... certainly got back to your post quickly.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Oh the police took me away, they did. They pulled out a spare Steel Samurai costume! Told me to "put it on." Can you imagine? How could I, a sweet little old lady, wear a giant suit like that?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Mr. Powers is pretty tall...

Name: Oldbag
Text: As soon as they saw there was no way I could wear it, they let me go.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I guess that would rule out her being the murderer.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Anyway! Know this, whippersnapper! This old lady NEVER forgets a slight or insult! And you won't get any information out of me! My lips are sealed!

Name: Maya
Text: You sure are talking a lot for someone with sealed lips.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Starting now! One, two, three, mmmph!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (This lady's too much...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm, about that kid you said you saw...

Name: Oldbag
Text: If I see him again, I'm taking him down!

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick! Look at her eyes! She's serious!

Name: Maya
Text: Hey! H-hey! Wait!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I'll bet he came in right through that drain...)

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, um, kiddy-o! What's yer name, sport?

Name: Cody
Text: I'm not a kid, so don't talk to me like that!

Name: Maya
Text: H-huh!? But you... You are a kid! What a rude little brat. That's no way to talk to an adult!

Name: Cody
Text: I don't see no adults here! Hippie fashion chick!

Name: Maya
Text: H-hippie fashion...? Nick... I think I'm being mocked.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (You got to hand it to Maya, she's pretty sharp. And pretty mad...)

Name: Cody
Text: I'm Cody! Cody Hackins. Call me "kiddy-o" again and I'll cut you down where you stand, evildoer!

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, you're a fan of the Steel Samurai?

Name: Cody
Text: How dare you utter that name, evildoer!

Name: Maya
Text: What do you mean? We're on the Steel Samurai's side!

Name: Cody
Text: H-hah! Hah hah! You can't fool me!

Name: Maya
Text: Okay... then what's the last line said by the innkeeper in Episode 8?

Name: Cody
Text: Hah! Easy! "Like some fries with that?"

Name: Maya
Text: Hmph... not bad, kiddy-o.

Name: Cody
Text: Watch it!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (What are they doing!?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Say, you heard anything about the incident the other day?

Name: Maya
Text: You were here, weren't you?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Did you see anything...?

Name: Cody
Text: He... he...

Name: Cody
Text: He... always... The Steel Samurai always wins! Always! Yeah, I saw 'em! I saw everything!

Name: Maya
Text: What!?

Name: Cody
Text: But... but no way am I telling you losers!

Name: Maya
Text: Wha--!? Wait...

Name: Cody
Text: Lemme go!

Name: Maya
Text: ... He's gone. Huh? Something fell off the table when he bumped into it on his way out.

Name: Phoenix
Text: A... bottle? Why was this sitting there, I wonder?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Anyway, what was that kid saying?

Name: Maya
Text: He "saw everything"...

Name: Maya
Text: Huh? Where's that old windbag?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Odd of her to leave her post...

Name: Oldbag
Text: (H-hey!!!)

Name: Maya
Text: Nick! That was her!

Name: Oldbag
Text: (S-stop! Whippersnapper!)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yeah. Sounds like she's chasing after that boy.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Natch!

Name: Maya
Text: Uh oh, she tripped!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Maya sure looks happy...)

Name: Maya
Text: Hey, hey, Nick. Now's our chance! Let's check out the guard station!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Good idea.

Name: Maya
Text: ... Oh! This is it, Nick! The "Trailer Key"!

Name: Phoenix
Text: The key to that trailer in Studio Two!

Name: Maya
Text: We'll be borrowing this, right, Nick?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I wonder if the key we borrowed from the guard station will work? ... It opened.

Name: Maya
Text: Great! Let's go, Nick!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (She seems eager all of a sudden...)

Name: Maya
Text: Well, you first, Nick!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Ah, not THAT eager.)

Name: Maya
Text: Eek! S-someone's in here!

Name: Vasquez
Text: Names.

Name: Maya
Text: O-our n-names? Um, w-we're WP's lawyers, and, um...

Name: Vasquez
Text: I see. ...

Name: Maya
Text: A-and who might you...?

Name: Vasquez
Text: Dee Vasquez. The producer.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Dee Vasquez... She's quite beautiful.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: I was wondering if you could tell me about the day of the murder...

Name: Phoenix
Text: M-Ms. Vasquez?

Name: Vasquez
Text: Script.

Name: Phoenix
Text: E-excuse me?

Name: Vasquez
Text: Script. I'm looking for a script.

Name: Phoenix
Text: A s-script?

Name: Vasquez
Text: "The Steel Samurai, Episode 13." I need it.

Name: Maya
Text: Umm... could we ask you a bit about the day of the murder?

Name: Vasquez
Text: I need to read it. ...

Name: Phoenix
Text: ... (We're getting nowhere fast.)

Name: Maya
Text: Um, w-we'd really like to ask you about the Steel Samurai!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Ms. Vasquez?

Name: Vasquez
Text: It's on TV. Every week. That's all I have to say about that.

Name: Maya
Text: N-Nick! She's telling us to go watch TV!? The nerve of her!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey, don't get mad at me.

Name: Phoenix
Text: About the director... Sal Manella, was it? What, er, exactly is his role here...?

Name: Vasquez
Text: Perhaps I didn't make myself clear? I'm looking for a script. I can't be bothered with anything else. ...

Name: Maya
Text: Nick? Are all people in the entertainment business this... weird?

Name: Phoenix
Text: It's starting to look like it.

Name: Maya
Text: Nick, let's get out of here. Isn't there someplace else we have to check?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yeah.

Name: Vasquez
Text: Wait.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Y-yes?

Name: Vasquez
Text: If you see Manella, give him this.

Name: Maya
Text: W-why do we have to do your errands...!

Name: Maya
Text: I... I don't think I like her. *sniff*

Name: Phoenix
Text: Don't cry. She'll take it as a sign of weakness. Alright. We'll give it to him if we see him.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Here. I got this from the producer...

Name: Manella
Text: Huh? "Bring the script for Episode 13"? Episode 13... where did I put that one? ... I must have left it somewhere... *sweats* U-uh oh... My ass is p0wned if I don't find it... *shakes*

Name: Maya
Text: Nick... It might be quicker to just look in all the places where he's likely to have been.

Name: Phoenix
Text: I agree.

Name: Maya
Text: We're back at the scene of the crime. Let's find what we need and get out of here quick, Nick.

Name: Maya
Text: Hey! Look! That's the chair the director sits in! I've always wanted to sit in one of these.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (The director...!) Maya... Take a look around that chair for me, would you? Remember that script the director was talking about? Didn't he say he'd left it somewhere?

Name: Maya
Text: Ahah! Found it, Nick! The script!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Good work!

Name: Phoenix
Text: We found your script.

Name: Manella
Text: W00t! THX! S-still... I dunno... That woman is to be ph34red when you bring something to her late... Say, um, j00 think j00 d00dz could take it down there for me? THX!

Name: Maya
Text: Is that producer really that scary?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Well, she's certainly not NORMAL...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Here, we found it! Your script!

Name: Vasquez
Text: Ah.

Name: Phoenix
Text: ... Umm... uh... You're not going to talk to us?

Name: Vasquez
Text: Quiet. I'm reading.

Name: Maya
Text: ...! Just you hold on! What's the big idea!? Who do you think you are anyway!? And, and do you even know who we are!?

Name: Vasquez
Text: ... Powers's lawyers?

Name: Maya
Text: Umm.... right.

Name: Vasquez
Text: Am I a suspect?

Name: Maya
Text: N-no, it's just, well, no, but...

Name: Vasquez
Text: ... You wanted to know about the day of the murder?

Name: Maya
Text: Y-yes. Anything you could tell us would be a big help.

Name: Vasquez
Text: ... You know there was a meeting here at noon?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes. With the director and the people from the network...

Name: Vasquez
Text: Correct. Now, listen closely. None of the people in this trailer that afternoon went to Studio One. It was impossible for us to leave.

Name: Maya
Text: Impossible? Why?

Name: Vasquez
Text: The path was blocked.

Name: Phoenix
Text: The... path?

Name: Phoenix
Text: On the day of the murder, the path that leads here was blocked?

Name: Vasquez
Text: You saw Mr. Monkey on the way here, correct?

Name: Phoenix
Text: M-"Mr. Monkey"?

Name: Vasquez
Text: The monkey with the broken head.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Oh, right, that... (What an original name...)

Name: Vasquez
Text: Its head fell over in the wind on the day of the murder. They didn't start moving the head out of the way until after 3:00. It was after 4:00 by the time the path was unblocked. Capsice? Everyone in this trailer was stuck here until the path was cleared. Stuck in this trailer. Stuck until after 4:00. Hammer died at 2:30. Thus, none of us could have gone to Studio One.

Name: Maya
Text: W-what!?

Name: Vasquez
Text: It's true. A crane came just after 3:00 to move the head. We called some people in to clear the way. I'm sure they'd corroborate my story.

Name: Phoenix
Text: B-but wait! What if the head fell over after 2:30? Then you could have gone to Studio One!

Name: Vasquez
Text: 2:30... the time of death. ... Very well. Come.

Name: Vasquez
Text: ... That's "Mr. Monkey." When it wasn't broken, it announced the time... in "ooks." One "ook" per hour. Ook ook ook ook. Always with the ooking.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (It IS a monkey, after all.)

Name: Vasquez
Text: Check its head. The clock inside stopped when it broke.

Name: Maya
Text: ...! Nick, it's stopped at 2:15.

Name: Vasquez
Text: That's right. This path was blocked from 2:15 till after 4:00. Therefore, we're innocent.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Mr. Hammer died in Studio One at 2:30...

Name: Vasquez
Text: See? Good bye.

Name: Maya
Text: What do we do, Nick? There isn't anyone besides WP who could have killed Hammer! It's over... We're finished!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (It sure doesn't look good. Guess we should head back to the office and plan our strategy...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Now what... We're fresh out of clues. Everyone's alibi is water-tight. We don't even have any promising leads. Things are looking pretty grim.

Name: Mia
Text: It's a little early for giving up, don't you think?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Mia
Text: You've got one lead...

Name: Phoenix
Text: M-Mia! It's you! What took you so long!?

Name: Mia
Text: Sorry, Phoenix. Maya has trouble calling me unless she's really in trouble.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right! Oh, wait. I guess that means we're really in trouble.

Name: Mia
Text: I'd say so.

Name: Phoenix
Text: What did you mean, we have one lead...?

Name: Mia
Text: The boy, of course.

Name: Cody
Text: Yeah, I saw 'em. I saw everything!

Name: Maya
Text: What!?

Name: Cody
Text: But...but no way am I telling you losers!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I dunno. He didn't sound like he was going to help us at all.

Name: Mia
Text: I'm sure you can find some way of bringing him over to your side. Either way, we should get back to the studios. That boy is our last hope, Phoenix.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Thanks, now I'm more worried than I was before...)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Huff... puff... huff... puff... huff... puff... huff... Huff... puff... huff... puff... huff... puff... huff...

Name: Phoenix
Text: W-what's wrong?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Huff... puff... huff... puff... whih... whippersnapper!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (She's been chasing that boy this whole time.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Huff... puff... when... when I ca... catch him... I... huff

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Sounds like she hasn't had any luck catching him.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Huff... puff... I... I got a hostage now, whippersnapper!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (A "hostage"...!?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Umm... what happened to the boy?

Name: Oldbag
Text: I-if I see him a-again, I'll... huff! L-lay him flat! Huff... puff...

Name: Mia
Text: My, what a violent old lady...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Actually, I met with the director just now...

Name: Oldbag
Text: Eh? Hah... my heart, it don't feel so good.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Is she okay!?)

Name: Oldbag
Text: B-before I go, I'd like to v-visit the place where poor H-Hammer died...

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Right... she was saying she wanted to visit the studio where he died.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: What's this about a "hostage"?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Huff... huff... W-when that boy was running away... ...he dropped this, a-and ran! Huff... huff... H-he'll come back... huff... huff... for this one!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (It's kind of hard to understand her with all that huffing and puffing.)

Name: Mia
Text: Phoenix! That "hostage" might be what we need! Cody might talk to us if we gave him that!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Good idea!) Ms. Oldbag! Might I...

Name: Oldbag
Text: No! I'm catching that brat if it's the last thing I do!

Name: Mia
Text: Phoenix. Do you have anything you might trade with her?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (A trade, hmm... I wonder...?)

Name: Oldbag
Text: H-hey... that... huff... That's a card... huff... Studio One?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Right. A cardkey to Studio One.

Name: Oldbag
Text: Huff... puff... I... I could visit poor Hammer... I'd like to visit... huff... he died... whew. I was his... his fan.

Name: Phoenix
Text: You don't have your own card, Ms. Oldbag?

Name: Oldbag
Text: Studio One isn't my turf. Huff... huff... You'll let me borrow... borrow it, then?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (If I give her the cardkey, then I won't be able to get into Studio One...!)

Name: Mia
Text: Why don't you let her borrow it, Phoenix?

Name: Phoenix
Text: I guess it can't hurt. Here you go, Ms. Oldbag.

Name: Oldbag
Text: ... Listen to me, sonny. I don't like having debts to no whippersnappers. You take this, and we're even. Deal?

Name: Phoenix
Text: What's this...? A Steel Samurai trading card?

Name: Oldbag
Text: That sneaky kid dropped it! I figure it's pretty important to him, though.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Thank you, I may have a use for this. (This must be the "hostage" she was talking about.)

Name: Oldbag
Text: Right. I'm off.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (There she goes, hobbling off toward the studio...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hey! Hey, you! W-wait a sec!

Name: Mia
Text: ... Phoenix... Was that the boy?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah. His name's "Cody Hackins."

Name: Mia
Text: I think he ran into the dressing room.

Name: Phoenix
Text: He's sure to be in here somewhere... Found you!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Dammit! He's getting away!

Name: Mia
Text: Come back! ... There. He's back.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (How did she...!?)

Name: Mia
Text: Hey there. Would you mind helping us out? Please?

Name: Cody
Text: ... I-I'm Cody.

Name: Mia
Text: Hello, Cody. I'm Mia. Mia Fey. Nice to meet you.

Name: Cody
Text: Yo.

Name: Phoenix
Text: And I'm Phoenix Wright!

Name: Cody
Text: Who asked?

Name: Mia
Text: Phoenix, you can take it from here.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I'm not so sure I'm qualified...)

Name: Phoenix
Text: The Steel Samurai's so cool. I think he's the, um, the "bomb."

Name: Cody
Text: Hah! What would a lamer like you know about the Steel Samurai!

Name: Phoenix
Text: H-hey, watch that attitude!

Name: Mia
Text: Phoenix, you really should't yell like that. He's only a kid.

Name: Cody
Text: Yeah! Don't yell like that I'm only a kid!

Name: Phoenix
Text: So, do you know anything about what happened here? Could you tell me, please?

Name: Cody
Text: I don't know nothing!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Hmm... looks like a little persuasion's necessary. Maybe a bribe...?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Cody... This look familiar?

Name: Cody
Text: Hey! My UR!

Name: Phoenix
Text: "You are"... huh?

Name: Cody
Text: "U.R." You know, "ultra rare"! That card's really hard to get! Man, for a grown-up, you sure are dumb!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I'll give you this... IF you help me.

Name: Cody
Text: But that's my card! By offering me something I already own, you're in effect eschewing the very basis of our consumer society, namely the principle of fair trade! Man, for a grown-up, you sure are dumb!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (W-what do they teach these kids in school these days!? Quantum physics!?)

Name: Cody
Text: Whatever, I don't need that card.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh?

Name: Cody
Text: I got a double. Just keep it. It's yours.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (What!? After I went through all that trouble...)

Name: Cody
Text: If you want to trade, find me a REALLY rare card!

Name: Phoenix
Text: "Really rare"!? You mean there's something rarer than "Ultra Rare"!?

Name: Cody
Text: Ultra Rare Premium cards are way rarer than plain Ultra Rare cards! Come ON! Man, for a grown-up, you sure are dumb!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Premium... rare... why do I feel like we're talking about steaks?

Name: Penny
Text: Oh, hi.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Hello. What brings you here?

Name: Penny
Text: Oh, well, I had to arrange some stuff... Umm...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yes?

Name: Penny
Text: The, um, girl with you. Doesn't she seem a little different? Like, is she even the same person as before?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Um, nope! She's the same as always.

Name: Mia
Text: Same as always.

Name: Penny
Text: Okay... whatever you say...

Name: Phoenix
Text: Have you seen that boy since then?

Name: Penny
Text: Nope. You missed it, though. The security lady was chasing around after the boy so fast I thought she'd collapse. Of course, he got away in the end. Boy, was she mad!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Actually, we saw them. How's the old windbag doing?

Name: Penny
Text: She was squeezing donuts through her clenched fists back at the guard station.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Some people take their jobs a little too seriously.)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Are all the posters on the wall here of Hammer?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes. It's really a terrible loss for the studios.

Name: Phoenix
Text: But... his popularity had been waning recently, right?

Name: Penny
Text: That's true. Then again, after what happened...

Name: Phoenix
Text: After WHAT happened?

Name: Penny
Text: Y-you mean, you don't know about Hammer...?

Name: Phoenix
Text: No, what?

Name: Penny
Text: I-I'm sorry. I shouldn't have said anything.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Wait, now you have to tell me. What happened with Hammer?

Name: Penny
Text: I-I'm sorry. I'm probably not the one who should tell you.

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Uh oh. Why do I get the feeling something's being covered up here?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Do you know anything about this?

Name: Penny
Text: Hey, that's a Steel Samurai trading card. I collect those, actually. I'm one card away from a complete set!

Name: Phoenix
Text: A complete set?

Name: Penny
Text: Yeah, a set of one of each card.

Name: Phoenix
Text: Huh...

Name: Penny
Text: ... Wait...Waitwaitwaitwait!!! That's it!!! That's the card I need! You don't know how long I've been looking for it!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Uh...

Name: Penny
Text: I don't care what kind of girl you might think I am, I need that card! P-please! I beg you! Please trade with me!

Name: Phoenix
Text: T-trade with you?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes, trade cards! Look, I'll even trade you an Ultra Rare Premium card!

Name: Phoenix
Text: Trade me a... huh?

Name: Penny
Text: Yes, it's a good deal for your Ultra Rare! Please!!!

Name: Mia
Text: Phoenix! Can't you see she's desperate?

Name: Phoenix
Text: (W-what's everybody getting so excited about...?)

Name: Phoenix
Text: Okay.

Name: Penny
Text: Really!? Th-thanks!!! Then this is for you.

Name: Penny
Text: Yaa-hoo!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (And there she goes...)

Name: Mia
Text: Doesn't doing good things like that make you feel great?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Yeah. Yeah, it does.

Name: Phoenix
Text: See this card?

Name: Cody
Text: Yeah, so... Wait! That's it!!! That's the last Ultra Rare Premium card I need! C'mon give it to me, please! You gotta give it to me!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Wow, I've never seen him so... eager.) R-right! Okay! How about a trade?

Name: Cody
Text: You're on! I'll give you a "Samurai Spear" and throw in an "Evil Magistrate" to boot!!

Name: Phoenix
Text: No no no no... not that kind of trade. I don't want cards. I want information.

Name: Cody
Text: Huh? You sure? Fine by me!

Name: Mia
Text: Okay, Phoenix. Let's hear what he has to say. If he knows something that could help us, we can have him take the stand tomorrow.

Name: Phoenix
Text: So... you like the Steel Samurai.

Name: Cody
Text: He's so cool!

Name: Phoenix
Text: I... I guess.

Name: Cody
Text: You're judging him by his looks! You have to look at his actions, at his life!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (I'm being lectured on life by a grade schooler...)

Name: Cody
Text: You like him too, don'tcha?

Name: Phoenix
Text: Uh... Oh, me? Y-yeah! I, um, love the Steel Samurai.

Name: Cody
Text: So, tell me what your favorite thing about the Steel Samurai is!

Name: Phoenix
Text: (Got to think of something...) I like it when he, uh, he vanquishes his foes!

Name: Cody
Text: Yeah! Whizzam! The Steel Samurai always wins! Always! Check this out! It's my fan album!

Name: Phoenix
